title: High Hopes for Businesses Catering to Same-Sex Weddings in Wisconsin
teaser: There’s lots of buzz surrounding same-sex marriage in Wisconsin. Organizers of an LGBT wedding expo in Wauwatosa hope it carries over to their event.
